lineId.dldescription: Unique identifier for the transaction in the source system

lineNumber.dldescription: Provides a line number within the transaction

accountId.dldescription: Unique identifier of the account in the source system

accountCode.dldescription: Numeric or string account ledge code as defined in the source system for that farm or enterprise

industryAccountCode.dldescription: Industry standard account code (used for benchmarking/reporting). Refer Appendix A.1 of Financial Data Standards at www.farmdatastandards.org.nz

category.dldescription: Optional additional categorisation (source system or agreed between exchanging parties)

netAmount.dldescription: The net amount for the transaction; positive for a debit and negative for a credit

taxAmount.dldescription: The amount of tax in the transaction

taxType.dldescription: The tax type (Refer Appendix A.2 of Financial Data Standards at www.farmdatastandards.org.nz)

grossAmount.dldescription: The tax inclusive amount (Net Amount + Tax Amount)

priceBasis.dldescription: Describes the pricing basis of the transaction. (See Appendix A.3 of Financial Data Standards at www.farmdatastandards.org.nz)

quantity.dldescription: Describes the number of units involved in the transaction

unit.dldescription: Describes the unit of measure for the item in the transaction. (See Appendix A.4 of Financial Data Standards at www.farmdatastandards.org.nz)

netUnitAmount.dldescription: Describes the value of one unit (Net Amount / Quantity)
